values.comment: If you're holding a Shadow Word: Pain, there is a high attack enemy minion, you're holding a Dragon and you have 5 Mana, try and play this.
values.condition: my_hand(count(), cardid = CS2_234) > 0 AND opp_minions(count(), attack > 4) > 0 AND my_hand(count(), dragon) > 0 AND my_hero(count(), mana) > 4

values.comment: Don't play this without a Dragon in hand.
Don't play this on a minion below 3 HP.
Don't play this on low HP targets or your minions.
